decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to commencement of the work: (a)  joinery, (b)  voysey style hinges, (c)  paint colour to be used on the tongue and groove fencing panels/posts, Such details shall be implemented only in accordance with the drawings as approved.  REASON: To safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, B21, B22, B24, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 4.6, 4.8.
description: Replacement timber fence/gates to front boundary
